nodes.text: The Empire Strikes Back Sketchbook is a reference book that was published by Ballantine Books in June 1980. The book collected many of the sketches created by Joe Johnston and Nilo Rodis-Jamero for the movie, The Empire Strikes Back.
A mind-boggling look at the imaginative designs from the exciting, powerful, fantastic space adventure!
Here are the early stages of the incredible vehicles, weapons and spaceships in the film, including:
The exciting Star Wars saga continues in The Empire Strikes Back.
